snippet: Blake Griffin has officially withdrawn from the Olympics and Anthony Davis has been added to the U.S. basketball team’s roster.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers star Blake Griffin officially withdraws from the Olympics due to injury and New Orleans Hornets rookie Anthony Davis is added to the US basketball team’s roster.
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin has officially withdrawn from the Olympics and Anthony Davis has been added to the U.S. basketball team’s roster.

headline.seo: Blake Griffin Off Olympic Team With Knee Injury
headline.main: Blake Griffin Off Olympic Team With Knee Injury
